pages.text: Cong ni de zhu jiang shi ni de, zheng shi zhenli, nandao renshi zhege daoli zhe gen mangren shi yiyang de ma? Wei you lizhi zhe caineng ji zhu
Tamen shi shijian an la de shiyue erqie bu pohuai mengyue de
Tamen shi lianjie an la ming ren lianjie zhe de, shi jingwei tamen de zhu de, shi weiju yanli de qingsuan de

Tamen shi wei qiu de ziji de yang zhu de xiyue er jianren de, shi jin shou bai gong de, shi mimi de he gongkai di fen she wo ci gei tamen de caiwu de, shi yidebaoyuan de. Zhe deng ren de chi houshi de shan guo——
changzhu leyuan, tamen jiang jinru leyuan. Tamen de zuxian, qizi he houyi zhong de shanliang zhe, dou jiang jinru leyuan. Zhong tianshi cong mei daomen jinqu jian tamen
(shuo):“Zhu nimen ping'an! Zhe shi nimen yin jianren er de de baochou, houshi de shan guozhen youmei.”
Yu an la diyue, ranhou jiayi pohuai de, duanjue an la ming ren lianjie zhe de, zai difang shang jinxing pohuai de, zhe deng ren jiang bei zuzhou, jiang chi houshi de eguo

An la shi tasuo yiyu zhe xiangshou kuanyu de jiyang huo jiongpo de jiyang. Tamen yin jinshi de shenghuo er huanxi, ran'er jinshi de shenghuo bi qi houshi de shenghuo lai, zhishi yi zhong (zhanshi) de xiangshou
Buxindao de renmen shuo:“Zenme meiyouyi zhong jixiang cong ta de zhu jianglin ta ne.” Ni shuo:“An la biding shi tasuo yiyu zhe wu ru mitu, biding shi guiyi ta de ren zou shang zhenglu.”
Tamen xindao, tamen de xinjing yin mingji an la er anjing, zhen de, yiqie xinjing yin mingji an la er anjing
